name: 應用計量經濟
description:
The main purpose of this course is to establish the essential foundations for the
empirical Econometrics and its applications. This course is designed for the Master
students in the institute of Management. Therefore, the degree of difficulties would be
adjusted to the needs of students. The purpose of the course is twofold. On the one hand,
the students should obtain a basic idea of model specifications, and develop quantitative
and analytical skills as well. On the other hand, data analysis, software package
applicationsin SAS, and empirical techniques and basic coding skill will be emphasized
in the class. A small empirical research project would be required and should be
presented at the end of semester. Basic contents in the class as follows:
1. How to collect data, read data, the meanings of data, TEJ data and other source of
data sets. Introduction of the source of data. (TEJ data, 國泰安資料、中央研究院
調查中心資料(需先加入會員，下載資料前先寫一頁計劃綱要申請通過，但是
資料非常豐富)、網路建構資料、世界銀行、IMF、ILO 等世界資料。
2. Programming and data, basic concepts.
3. Apply the programming to the setup model
4. Coding for the regressions
5. Interpretation of the regression results
goals: the students should obtain a basic idea of model specifications, and develop quantitative
data analysis, software package applicationsin SAS, and empirical techniques and basic coding skill will be emphasized in the class.
